name: Week 8 Project - There's Something in the Trailer
name_original: Week 8 Project - There's Something in the Trailer
description:
Week 8 Project - There's Something in the Trailer is a game developed by game3400spring2023team2. It came out on 15-03-2023.
Week 8 Project - There's Something in the Trailer is available on macOS. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
